message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I really need to get a good price for this product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $98.
I can see you're really serious about getting this product, Bob! I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get a bit more for it. How about we meet at $105?
I'm really close to my limit, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $102, but that's as high as I can go.
I appreciate your honesty, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $107, but I really think the product is worth more than that. Let's see if we can find a sweet spot.
